questions.text: What are the titles of the research papers Theo's sister writes?
What is the record number of birds catalogued in one "Big Year"?
What does Leo always call photos that are taken for him?
What does one social media obsessed character call his followers?
What does the owner of the house they are renting try to sell them?
questions.answer: Paintings of cactuses doing human activities, palm and tarot readings

questions.text: What board game upsets the children's father?
What is the name of the river that Theo kayaks down?
What does "Bob the boy with perfect memory" ultimately decide to do?
questions.answer: He chooses not to take the pill that will give him "normal" memory

questions.text: does the main character's father drive very poorly, often getting honked at by other cars?
does the main character have an idea for a series titled, "Bob: The boy with Perfect Memory"?
does the main character have a cat that has "pared his daily schedule down to one hour of eating and twenty-three hours of sleeping"?
is a character fully dedicated to finding and cataloguing as many North American bird species as possible?
does one character's last name translate to "The big Cheese" in German?
does one character often talk about how "qi" affects a person?
is one character named after the inventor of the laser?
